snippet: Gavin Newsom, the lieutenant governor of California who is planning to run for governor in 2018, released an online ad that criticizes Donald J. Trump’s proposals on immigration and mocks his hair.
abstract: Gavin Newsom, the lieutenant governor of California who is planning to run for governor in 2018, released an online ad that criticizes Donald J. Trump’s proposals on immigration and mocks his hair.

headline.main: California’s Gavin Newsom Chides Donald Trump on Immigration Plan (and Comb-Over)
